alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 11:14PM EST until February 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several places. At 21.5 feet, Sang Branch Road is under water at Red Lick Creek. At 25.0 feet, Moderate flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM EST Thursday was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.5 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.7 feet on 03/30/2021. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued 8 AM EST Friday.
